channel.title: Legal on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Legal on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Switch modder owes Nintendo $2 million after representing himself in court
item.description: Daly’s defense asserted, in part, that Nintendo’s “alleged copyrights are invalid.”

item.title: Judge: Google can keep Chrome, must share search data with “qualified competitors”
item.description: Google’s penalty for being a search monopoly does not include selling Chrome.

item.title: Google won’t have to sell Chrome, judge rules
item.description: Google’s penalty for being a search monopoly does not include selling Chrome.

item.title: Google loses app store antitrust appeal, must make sweeping changes to Play Store
item.description: Google’s failed appeal could open up the market for Android apps.
